scripts.say: Commander’s storage is... so messy... {namecode:98} simply can’t bare to look at it...
The stuff that you’re not using should be disassembled immediately, nya!
I’ve finished tidying up the storage, we’re still good friends, ok! If you want new equipments then go buy tech packs from {namecode:98}!
--- of course there won’t be a discount just because you’re the Commander, nya!
